Text: TECH ALERT Amazon Loss Narrows Compaq Swings to Loss TECHNOLOGY ALERT from The Wall Street Journal Oct Amazoncom reported a narrower thirdquarter loss that matched analyst expectations amid weak growth in revenue The online retailer stuck with its profitability target articlesSBhtm Compaq swung to a widerthanexpected loss in the third quarter on a drop in revenue amid shipment problems and slack demand for computers articlesSBhtm For more on the proposed CompaqHP merger see pageshpcompaqhtm ADVERTISEMENT Visit CareerJournalcom The Wall Street Journals executive career site Read articles on job hunting and career management plus search highlevel jobs For todays features and job listings click to SUBSCRIPTION INFORMATION TO REMOVE YOURSELF from this list see usercgibinsearchUserplactionemailalert Then uncheck the appropriate box to unsubscribe from this list Click on the save selections button For further questions please call our customer service department at or between the hours of am and pm Eastern MondayFriday or email Copyright Dow Jones Company Inc All Rights Reserved

BUSINESS ALERT AMR Posts Big Loss BUSINESS ALERT from The Wall Street Journal October AMR Corp reported a thirdquarter loss of million its largest quarterly shortfall ever blaming the disastrous financial effects of the terrorist attacks and the continuing weakness of the economy Meanwhile Sears Roebuck and Co said it will cut about jobs in a broad restructuring plan as the retailer reported a profit drop Eastman Kodak Co announced plans to cut jobs while reporting a decline in net and warning that fourthquarter results may miss analysts estimates FOR MORE INFORMATION AND CONTINUOUS UPDATES see pagesfronthtm ADVERTISEMENT Visit CareerJournalcom The Wall Street Journals executive career site Read articles on job hunting and career management plus search highlevel jobs For todays features and job listings click to SUBSCRIPTION INFORMATION TO REMOVE YOURSELF from this list see usercgibinsearchUserplactionemailalert usercgibinsearchUserplactionemailalert Then uncheck the appropriate box to unsubscribe from this list Click on the save selections button When you registered with WSJcom you indicated you wished to receive this Business News Alert email For further questions please call our customer service department at or between the hours of am and pm Eastern MondayFriday or email Copyright Dow Jones Company Inc All Rights Reserved

TECH ALERT Microsoft IBM Nortel Post ResultsPST TECHNOLOGY ALERT from The Wall Street Journal Jan MICROSOFT POSTED a decline in fiscal secondquarter profit hurt by the weak economy and a lawsuitrelated charge Revenue however rose on strong demand for its Windows XP operating system and Xbox game system IBM PROFIT slightly beat Wall Street expectations for the fourth quarter But the computer giant missed revenue targets amid weak PC and hardware sales For the full articles as well as results from Unisys Nortel and Network Associates see pagestechmainhtm ADVERTISEMENT In touch Any time Anywhere With Lotus Wireless Solutions you can stay connected via cell phones PDAs and other wireless devices Collaborate more efficiently to make timecritical decisions respond to customer needs faster and eliminate downtime Click for special offers informedmw SUBSCRIPTION INFORMATION TO REMOVE YOURSELF from this list see usercgibinsearchUserplactionemailalert Then uncheck the appropriate box to unsubscribe from this list Click on the save selections button For further questions please call our customer service department at or between the hours of am and pm Eastern MondayFriday or email Copyright Dow Jones Company Inc All Rights Reserved

TECH ALERT Intel Posts Drop in Profit Beats Hopes EBay Net Inc ome RisesPST TECHNOLOGY ALERT from The Wall Street Journal Jan Intel reported a drop in profit due to weaker revenue and acquisitionrelated costs Excluding items the chip maker easily beat expectations Meanwhile eBay posted an increase in net income For more information see pagestechmainhtm ADVERTISEMENT Gain an advantage by unlocking knowledge about your customers and use it to develop better relationships Join IBM and i on a WebcastUnlocking Knowledge About Your Customers and access innovative tools that can help you succeed in todays ebusiness environment softwareinfovisitordbenewsletter SUBSCRIPTION INFORMATION TO REMOVE YOURSELF from this list see usercgibinsearchUserplactionemailalert Then uncheck the appropriate box to unsubscribe from this list Click on the save selections button For further questions please call our customer service department at or between the hours of am and pm Eastern MondayFriday or email Copyright Dow Jones Company Inc All Rights Reserved

BUSINESS ALERT Ford Unveils Restructuring PlanPST BUSINESS ALERT from The Wall Street Journal Jan Ford Motor Co announced a broad restructuring program that cuts jobs worldwide closes five plants and slashes production by in an effort to restore profitability Chief Executive William Ford Jr also announced the company would take a billion restructuring charge for the fourth quarter FOR MORE INFORMATION see articlesSBhtm ADVERTISEMENT In touch Any time Anywhere With Lotus Wireless Solutions you can stay connected via cell phones PDAs and other wireless devices Collaborate more efficiently to make timecritical decisions respond to customer needs faster and eliminate downtime Click for special offers informedmw SUBSCRIPTION INFORMATION TO REMOVE YOURSELF from this list see usercgibinsearchUserplactionemailalert usercgibinsearchUserplactionemailalert Then uncheck the appropriate box to unsubscribe from this list Click on the save selections button When you registered with WSJcom you indicated you wished to receive this Business News Alert email For further questions please call our customer service department at or between the hours of am and pm Eastern MondayFriday or email Copyright Dow Jones Company Inc All Rights Reserved

BUSINESS ALERT Accounting Firm Destroyed Enron DocumentsPST BUSINESS ALERT from The Wall Street Journal Jan Arthur Andersen LLP already under fire for its audits of Enron Corp said it had destroyed documents sought by federal lawenforcement officials Andersen said it notified federal officials that individuals at the firm disposed of a significant but undetermined amount of documents relating to its work for the Houston energy company FOR MORE INFORMATION see articlesSBhtm FOR FULL COVERAGE OF ENRONS COLLAPSE see pagesenronpagehtm ADVERTISEMENT In touch Any time Anywhere With Lotus Wireless Solutions you can stay connected via cell phones PDAs and other wireless devices Collaborate more efficiently to make timecritical decisions respond to customer needs faster and eliminate downtime Click for special offers informedmw SUBSCRIPTION INFORMATION TO REMOVE YOURSELF from this list see usercgibinsearchUserplactionemailalert usercgibinsearchUserplactionemailalert Then uncheck the appropriate box to unsubscribe from this list Click on the save selections button When you registered with WSJcom you indicated you wished to receive this Business News Alert email For further questions please call our customer service department at or between the hours of am and pm Eastern MondayFriday or email Copyright Dow Jones Company Inc All Rights Reserved

TECH ALERT Judge Denies Microsoft RequestPST TECHNOLOGY ALERT from The Wall Street Journal Jan A FEDERAL JUDGE denied Microsofts request to delay the companys historic antitrust case by four months holding to the current schedule that calls for a trial in March For more information see articlesSBhtm For complete coverage of the trial including documents rulings chronologies and more see pagesmicrosfthtm ADVERTISEMENT FREE WHITE PAPER When the economy takes a turn for the worse businesses start examining operational expenses including solutions to help them better scrutinize and control enterprise spending Learn more by downloading your free copy of the Aberdeen Groups Expense Management Automation Offers Antidote to the Down Economy landingdmhtm SUBSCRIPTION INFORMATION TO REMOVE YOURSELF from this list see usercgibinsearchUserplactionemailalert Then uncheck the appropriate box to unsubscribe from this list Click on the save selections button For further questions please call our customer service department at or between the hours of am and pm Eastern MondayFriday or email Copyright Dow Jones Company Inc All Rights Reserved
